DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy Lyophilized amniotic fluid compare Saline Injection , placebo control treatment moderate osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.brief_title: Protocol Clinical Evaluation Lyophilized Amniotic Fluid Treatment Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 180 subject enrol one three dose arm ( 4ml , Saline Placebo 4ml 2x ) . The estimated enrollment period 6 month . Each subject receive 1 injection evaluate efficacy safety 6 month observation period . The study expect complete within 12 month , inclusive enrollment follow-up subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 30 year old . 2 . Subject diagnosis osteoarthritis ( OA ) define Grade 1 3 Kellgren Lawrence grade scale . 3 . Subject willing able provide inform consent participate procedure followup evaluation necessary complete study . 4 . Subject must VAS pain scale great 30 . 1 . Subject active infection injection site . 2 . Subject rheumatoid arthritis , psoriatic arthritis , diagnose autoimmune disorder could cause knee pain . 3 . BMI great 45 kg/m2 4 . Subject receive intraarticular hyaluronic acid ( HA ) injection treatment OA target knee within 12 week prior screen . 5 . Subject receive steroid platelet rich plasma ( PRP ) injection treatment OA target knee within 12 week prior screen . 6 . Subject major surgery arthroscopy target knee within 26 week treatment plan surgery target knee within 180 day treatment . 7 . Subject pregnant plan become pregnant within 180 day treatment . 8 . Subject use investigational drug , device biologic within 12 week prior treatment . 9 . Subject significant medical condition , opinion Investigator , would interfere protocol evaluation participation . 10 . Subject history immunosuppressive chemotherapy last 5 year 11 . Subject autoimmune disease know history Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndromes ( AIDS ) HIV 12 . Subject prior radiation site 13 . Subject currently take anticoagulant therapy ( exclude Plavix Aspirin ) 14 . New diagnosis gout past 6 month 15 . Subject diagnosis osteoarthritis ( OA ) define Grade 4 Kellgren Lawrence grade scale . 16 . Subject diagnosis Osteonecrosis knee . 17 . Subject total knee replacement .
